text: ya ye na kaho ki yadi hamapar pustak utaaree jaatee, to ham nishchay unase adhik seedhee raah par hote, to ab tumhaare paas tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se ek khula tark aa gaya, maargadarshan tatha daya aa gayee. phir usase bada atyachaaree kaun hoga, jo allaah kee aayaton ko mithya kah de aur unase katara jaaye? aur jo log hamaaree aayaton se kataraate hain, ham unake kataraane ke badale unhen kadee yaatana denge
